roleset.name: surgical removal of a body part

example.name: with arg 1 and instrument
example.text: A 1.5 cm, flat, villous-appearing lesion was ablated with gold probe ablation

roleset.note: Based o Sharp and Thyme data. Comparison to ablation.01-n. Ablate.01 fits with VN class remove-10.1. Framed by Katie.
